original_text: When Mordecai learned of all that had been done, he tore his clothes, put on sackcloth and ashes, and went out into the city, wailing loudly and bitterly.
korean_text: 모르드개가 이 모든 일을 알고 자기의 옷을 찢고 굵은 베 옷을 입고 재를 뒤집어쓰고 성중에 나가서 대성 통곡하며

sentences.original_text: When Mordecai learned of all that had been done
sentences.korean_translation: 모르드개가 모든 일이 행해진 것을 알았을 때

sentences.original_text: and went out into the city
